Verses: 1 karththar Sollugiradhaik Kelungal; Nee Ezhundhu, Parvadhangalukku Mun Un Vazhakkai Sol; Malaigal Un Saththaththaik Ketkakkadavadhu.
2 parvadhangale, Boomiyin Urudhiyaana Asthibaarangale Karththarudaiya Vazhakkaik Kelungal; Karththarukku Avar Janaththode Vazhakku Irukkiradhu; Isravelode Avar Vazhakkaaduvaar.
3 en Janame, Naan Unakku Enna Seydhen? Naan Edhinaal Unnai Visanappaduththinen? Enakku Edhire Uththaravu Sol.
4 naan Unnai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Varappanni, Adimaiththana Veettilirundhu Unnaimeettukkondu Mose Aaron Miriyaam Enbavargalai Unakku Munbaaga Anuppinen.

5 en Janame, Movaabin Raajaavaagiya Paalaak Pannina Yosanai Innadhendrum, Peyorin Kumaaranaana Pileyaam Avanukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga Sonnadhu Innadhendrum, Siththeem Thodangi Kilkaalmattum Nadandhadhu Innadhendrum Nee Karththarudaiya Needhigalai Arindhukollumpadi Ninaiththukkol.

6 ennaththaikkondu Naan Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Vandhu, Unnadhamaana Dhevanukku Munbaagap Panindhukolven? Thaganapaligalaikkondum, Oru Vayadhu Kandrukkuttigalaikkondum Avar Sannidhiyil Varavendumo?

7 aayirangalaana Aattukkadaakkalinperilum, Enneyaai Odugira Padhinaayirangalaana Aarugalinperilum Karththar Piriyamaayiruppaaro? En Akkiramaththaip Pokka En Mudhar Peraanavanaiyum, En Aaththumaavin Paavaththaip Pokka En Karppakkaniyaiyum Kodukkavendumo?

8 manushane, Nanmai Innadhendru Avar Unakku Ariviththirukkiraar; Nyaayancheydhu, Irakkaththai Snegiththu, Un Dhevanukku Munbaaga Manaththaazhmaiyaai Nadappadhai Allaamal Vere Ennaththaik Karththar Unnidaththil Ketkiraar.
9 karththarudaiya Saththam Nagaraththai Nokkik Kooppidugiradhu; Gnaanamullavan Ummudaiya Naamaththai Madhippaan; Milaatrirkum Adhai Nemiththavarukkum Sevikodungal.
10 dhunmaarkkanudaiya Veettile Dhunmaarkkaththinaal Sambaadhiththa Pokkishangalum, Aruvarukkappadaththakka Kuraindha Marakkaalum Innum Irukkiradhallavo?
11 kallaththaraasum Kallap Padikkarkalulla Paiyum Irukkumpodhu, Avargalai Suththamullavargalendru Ennuveno?
12 avargalil Aisuvariyamullavargal Kodumaiyaal Niraindhirukkiraargal: Avargalukkul Vaasamaayirukkiravargal Poipesugiraargal; Avargal Vaayilulla Naavu Kabadamulladhu.
13 aagaiyaal Naan Un Paavangalinimiththam Unnai Adiththup Paazhaakkugiradhinaal Unnai Balatchayamaakkuven.
14 nee Pusiththum Thirupthiyadaiyaadhiruppaai; Unakkulle Sorvundaagum; Nee Padhanam Panniyum Thappuvippadhillai; Nee Thappuvippadhaiyum Pattayaththukku Oppukkoduppen.
15 nee Vidhaiththum Arukkaamarpovaai; Nee Olivappazhangalaiyum Dhraatchappazhangalaiyum Aalaiyaadinapodhilum, Enney Poosikkolvadhumillai Rasam Kudippadhumillai.

16 naan Unnaip Paazhaagavum Un Kudigalai Eesalittu Nindhikkira Nindhaiyaagavum Vaikkumpadi, Umriyinudaiya Kattalaigalum Aagaab Veettaarudaiya Ellaa Seygaigalum Kaikkollappattuvarugiradhu; Avargaludaiya Aalosanaigalile Nadakkireergal; Aagaiyaal En Janaththin Nindhaiyai Sumappeergal.
